Description.UIName: Permanent Contract for Slayer Aerospace Fighter
Description.Name: Permanent Contract for Slayer Aerospace Fighter
Description.Details: Thanks to the ASF's common status, this is a permanent contract offer for use of a Slayer Aerospace Fighter during Strafing Runs. Purchasing this contract will permit the use of the Slayer Aerospace Fighter when making use of the Strafing Run Comm Suite. This contract is permanent and does not expire. Hold Shift when deploying the strafe ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
